name: googleprivacyenhancer
title: GooglePrivacyEnhancer
description: Performs random Google searches and clicks on links

preferences.name: clickOnResults
preferences.title: Click on search result links
preferences.description: Follow a link from the search results page, otherwise you are just performing searches

preferences.name: totalSearches
preferences.title: Max Searches
preferences.description: The maximum number of searches to run per session.
